charges.charge_description: 18 USC 1344 and 1029 (1)knowingly execute and scheme or artifice to defraud a financial institution or to obain any of the moneys, funds, credits, assets, securities, or other property owned by, or under the custody or control of, a financial institution, by means of false or fraudulent pretenses, representations or promises, and (2) knowingly and with intent to defraud, traffic in or use one or more unauthorized access devices during any one-year period, and by such conduct obtained anything of value aggregating $1,000 or more during that period
